title: Phantom: interact with invisible beings
team: Myeongseong Kim, Junbeom Shin, Donghyeon Ko, Woohun Lee
summary: Phantom is an installation that interacts with virtually invisible beings by putting a pebble on the board.
By focusing ultrasonic vibrations on one point, it can draw patterns by pushing away the dust.

paragraph: Phantom is an installation that interacts with virtually invisible beings by putting a pebble on the board.
By focusing ultrasonic vibrations on one point, it can draw patterns by pushing away the dust.
